def get(n):
    sum = 0
    while n>0:
        dig = n%10
        if dig%2:
            sum = sum + dig
        else:
            sum = sum + dig*2
        n = n/10
    return sum%10

T = input()
while T>0:
    s = raw_input().split(" ")
    n1 = int(s[0])
    n2 = int(s[1])
    i=0
    sum=0
    i=n1
    while i%10:
        sum = sum + get(i)
        i=i+1
    n1=i
    i=n2
    while i%10:
        sum = sum + get(i)
        i = i-1
    sum = sum + get(i)
    n2=i
    dif=n2-n1
    sum=sum+dif/10*45
    print sum
    T = T-1
